channel.title: MSDN: U.S. Local Highlights
channel.description: The latest developer information for the United States.

item.title: Office 2007 and Visual Studio 2008 Interoperability
item.description: Do you like Office 2007 and Visual Studio 2008? We blend the two to show you the richness of Microsoft Visual Studio Tools for Office (VSTO).

item.title: How Do You Perform Imperative Security Checks?
item.description: In less than 10 minutes, learn how to help protect your application code by streaming this play-by-play video.

item.title: Windows Vista Service Pack 1 (SP1)
item.description: Windows Vista Service Pack 1 is an update to Windows Vista that addresses feedback from our customers.

item.title: Looking to Join a User Group?
item.description: Codezone connects you with top-rated user groups, meetings, community sites, blogs, forums, events, and breaking news.

item.title: Securing .NET Applications with ProtectedData Class?
item.description: So are thousands of other developers. One of our MVPs shows you how in this 21-minute play-by-play.

item.title: Try MSDN's New Social Bookmarking Tool
item.description: Track useful links discovered by your peers and share your favorite bookmarks with others.

item.title: Blog: Microsoft Assessment and Planning Toolkit 3.1
item.description: Check out the Windows Vista Team's discussion of new capabilities in the MAP Toolkit, including Hyper-V virtualization assessment and more.

item.title: Have You Discovered What Everyone Else Has Found?
item.description: Sharpen your security expertise by checking out the latest short videos.

item.title: Overview of New Tools in Visual Studio 2008
item.description: Watch this video for a look at some new key tools that come with Visual Studio 2008 and why they are important to you.

item.title: Download Enterprise Library 4.0 for Visual Studio 2008
item.description: Let Enterprise Library guide you in managing common enterprise development challenges, and join others in our community!

item.title: How Does Your Company Survive Without You?
item.description: Let us show you great security practices to keep them wondering how you make security management seem effortless.

item.title: Download the Microsoft Assessment and Planning Toolkit (MAP)
item.description: The Microsoft Assessment and Planning Toolkit (MAP) makes it easy for you to assess your current IT infrastructure and determine the right Microsoft technologies for your IT needs.

item.title: Windows Vista Forum to the Rescue
item.description: Get information from your peers on issues that are important to you.

item.title: Drive Faster Evaluation of Your Software
item.description: Evaluate Microsoft and partner solutions through pre-configured Virtual Hard Disks (VHDs) in your own environment, without dedicated servers or complex installations.

item.title: Windows Presentation Foundation Tools in Visual Studio 2008
item.description: Take a brief look at why Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) is cool, and how Microsoft Visual Studio 2008 makes writing WPF apps even cooler.

item.title: One of the Most Popular "How Do I?" Security Videos
item.description: Watch MVP Will DePalo as he shows you how to digitally ensure message integrity and authenticity.

item.title: Download Visual Studio 2008 Professional Edition
item.description: Visual Studio 2008 Professional Edition enables developers and development teams to create great connected applications on the latest platforms.

item.title: Develop on SharePoint
item.description: Check out the SharePoint Developer Portal and learn how to develop on SharePoint.

item.title: Creating a Simple Sidebar Gadget Virtual Lab
item.description: After completing this lab, you will be better able to build a Gadget and more.

item.title: Connect and Get Things Done
item.description: Check out the forums, social bookmarking, and wikis designed to help you connect. Join the conversation.

item.title: Overview of New Features for Windows Applications
item.description: Here we take a fresh look at how the functionality in the Microsoft Visual Studio 2008 development system empowers Windows developers and helps them create better applications.

item.title: How Does Your Company Survive Without You?
item.description: Let us show you great security practices to keep them wondering how you make security management seem effortless.

item.title: Download Visual Studio 2008 Professional Edition
item.description: Visual Studio 2008 Professional Edition enables developers and development teams to create great connected applications on the latest platforms.

item.title: Microsoft Assessment and Planning
item.description: Hyper-V virtualization technology can make your life much easier when it comes to modeling and creating a test environment.

item.title: Windows Vista Hardware Assessment 2.0
item.description: This webcast demonstrates how Windows Vista Hardware Assessment assesses hardware and device compatibility.

item.title: Windows Embedded Standard Virtual Launch Webcast
item.description: Attend this launch webcast and be the first to learn about Windows Embedded Standard.

item.title: Overview of New Features in Visual Studio 2008
item.description: Watch a discussion on some of the things that make the Microsoft Visual Studio 2008 development system great!

item.title: Get Information About Windows Vista SP1
item.description: Read this helpful information before you download Windows Vista Service Pack 1 (SP1).

item.title: Test Drive SQL Server 2008 Today
item.description: Get information about SQL Server 2008 and experience it yourself.

item.title: Use the New .NET StockTrader 2.0 Sample Application
item.description: Try .NET StockTrader 2.0 sample application to build high-performance and reliable services with the .NET Framework 3.5.

item.title: SharePoint Web 2.0 Fire Starter
item.description: Read a blog regarding a Microsoft live event that you too can attend.

item.title: Connect and Get Things Done
item.description: Check out the forums, social bookmarking, and wikis designed to help you connect. Join the conversation.

item.title: Bill Gates and Steve Ballmer Discuss Windows Vista
item.description: Watch a video of Bill Gates and Steve Ballmer's discussion of 28 years working together.

item.title: Win a Windows Home Server
item.description: Try Microsoft server products and a Windows Home Server could be yours!

item.title: Create Your Own Opinion of Windows Server 2008
item.description: Test drive Windows Server 2008 today.

item.title: Accelerate Development with Windows Embedded
item.description: Acceleration Workshops are hands-on training sessions for professional embedded developers.

item.title: MSDN Opening Up to the Developer Community
item.description: MSDN is offering all-new online community experiences, including forums, profile pages, and social bookmarking.

item.title: LIVE! MSDN Social Bookmarks Preview
item.description: Save all your favorites online, see what others are bookmarking, and even get your bookmarks published.

item.title: Find Out How to Get Expression Studio 2
item.description: Purchase any Expression product before June 1, 2008, and you qualify for a free upgrade.

item.title: Join Your User Group Community
item.description: Check out INETA, find your local user group and join today!

item.title: Five Ways to Make Windows Vista Adoption Easier
item.description: Learn how to master the challenging aspects of deploying Windows Vista.

item.title: Accelerate Development with Windows Embedded
item.description: Acceleration Workshops are training sessions that help you streamline your development process.

item.title: Nikhil Kothari on Facebook.NET and Everything Else!
item.description: Listen in as Nikhil Kothari talks about his experiences working at Microsoft on all things Web, including ASP.NET controls and Facebook.NET.

item.title: Try Expression Blend 2 and Expression Encoder 2
item.description: Harness the power of XAML, .NET and Silverlight to deliver compelling user experiences for both connected desktops and the Web with the next generation of Microsoft Expression products. Upgrade to Expression Version 2 products with prices as low as $99.

item.title: Download Enterprise Library 4.0 for Visual Studio 2008
item.description: Freely reusable components and guidance encapsulating Microsoft recommended development practices.

item.title: 24 Hours of Windows Server 2008
item.description: In this session, we introduce the 24 Hours of Windows Server 2008 webcast series, which covers key pillars and goals for Windows Server 2008.

item.title: Preparing for Tech·Ed: Be Ready
item.description: Try this course in Windows Mobile software development, which (part 1 of 5) helps prepare you for the Windows Mobile sessions to be presented at Tech·Ed Orlando on June 3 - 6.

item.title: Developer Show: Introduction to Visual Basic .NET
item.description: Join this webcast to learn why Microsoft Visual Basic .NET and Microsoft Visual C# are the languages of choice for developers.

item.title: Accelerate Your Development Cycle
item.description: Acceleration workshops are hands-on training sessions for professional embedded developers that help you streamline your development process and bring your next-gen embedded device to market faster.

item.title: Create Your Own Opinion of Windows Server 2008
item.description: Test drive Windows Server 2008 today.

item.title: Don't Miss Bill Gates at Tech·Ed
item.description: Don't miss your opportunity to attend the Bill Gates keynote. Register now to learn about Gates' vision for the future of the IT industry.

item.title: MSDN's Most Popular Downloads!
item.description: Check out the list of MSDN's most popular downloads. If everyone else is downloading them, what are you waiting for?

item.title: See How Windows Server 2008 Stacks Up Versus Linux
item.description: Read analysis and reports on how Windows Server 2008 provides outstanding value and reliability as a platform, and learn what the new innovations in Windows Server 2008 can do for you.

item.title: Buy Expression Studio and Get Expression Studio 2 Free
item.description: If you purchase any Expression product before June 1, 2008, you qualify for a free upgrade to version 2 of the same product.

item.title: Win a Windows Home Server
item.description: Try Microsoft server products and a Windows Home Server could be yours!

item.title: Download Visual Studio 2008 Service Pack 1 Beta Today
item.description: Visual Studio 2008 SP1 Beta introduces full support for SQL Server 2008, improved performance in the IDE and WPF designers, improved Web development and site deployment, as well as many Team Foundation Server enhancements.

item.title: Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 Beta Now
item.description: Download the Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 Beta for improved features for both client and Web development. Additionally, SP1 for the .NET Framework introduces the ADO.NET Entity Framework and ADO.NET Data Services.

item.title: Check Out What's New in Visual C# 3.0
item.description: This lab walks you through the new features of C# 3.0: auto-implemented properties, implicitly typed local variables, implicitly typed arrays, extension methods and more.

item.title: .NET Framework 3.5 Download Now Available
item.description: Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 contains many new features building incrementally upon .NET Framework 2.0 and 3.0, and includes .NET Framework 2.0 Service Pack 1 and .NET Framework 3.0 Service Pack 1.

item.title: Stay Sharp on SQL Server 2008 and Stay Ahead
item.description: After completing this lab, you will be able to launch the Report Designer preview, create a data source and a data set, design a new report using the Report Designer of SQL Server 2008 Reporting Services, and more.

item.title: The Newest Microsoft Security Intelligence Report
item.description: The Microsoft Security Intelligence Report (SIR) provides an in-depth perspective on the changing threat landscape, including software vulnerability disclosures and exploits, malicious software (malware), and potentially unwanted software.

item.description: After completing this lab, you will be better able to build Gadgets, deploy and install Gadgets, and build a Gadget settings interface.

item.description: In this lab, you will use the powerful new CSS editor in Visual Studio 2008 to manage style sheets in Web pages. You will also try out other new tools like the new DataPager control and the new LINQ Data Source.

item.title: The Big Easy Offer
item.description: Check out the Big Easy Offer and find out how you can purchase Microsoft developer tools to rapidly create compelling software applications and receive partner subsidy funds from Microsoft to enrich your solution.
